Trust Region Policy Optimization Explained

Recently, I have been trying to get into Deep Reinforcement learning and one of the imporant papers for a continuous control that generally crops up in the paper on Trust Region Policy Optimization.
It is important to mention here that there are two types of networks mentioned in the paper. One is the policy function $\pi$. which generates appropriate stochastic policy and other network is specifically dedicated to generating the Value function in the problem.
